title: 300+ Ping when watching videos on Achievement Hunter website.
body:
I've tested this issue without watching videos, without watching videos and using Haste, with watching videos and haste and finally watching videos without haste.

Anytime I'm on the Achievement Hunter website and a video is playing, my ping shoots up to 300+. This is a huge leap from my usual 30. Has anyone else ever had this problem before? Or am I just going insane here?

replies.body: You are not alone. It's anything you watch on the Roosterteeth website. I figured it was just their video service that caused it because I can watch the same videos on Youtube with barely a change in my ping. Nice to know I am not alone on this.
Okay, glad I am not alone in this. Yeah I just watched the Always Open episode on youtube with no issues.

Hey I'm not familiar with these sites, but generally you can run into issues reaching specific services even if your internet is fine.  Using a VPN like haste can also cause you some delays as well, and in this case your routing might have changed to take a long time to reach your service.

The problem is there even without using Haste.

I just assume the video player on the website just has issues with league.
